summary: Cyberpunk 2077 muestra nuevas imágenes en la Gamescom
title: Cyberpunk 2077 muestra nuevas imágenes en la Gamescom
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 muestra nuevas imágenes en la Gamescom

CD Projekt Red prometió dar novedades acerca de Cyberpunk 2077 en la Gamescom 2018 y han cumplido. Tal vez no es lo que esperábamos, ya que se han guardado el gameplay del E3 para otro momento, pero nos dejan ver nuevas imágenes del esperadísimo juego.

Estos cuatro screenshots extraídos directamente del motor del juego nos dejan ver la excelente dirección artística que están llevando…

View On WordPress

summary: that was a shitty joke and a shitty apology but i dont think people should be deciding cp2077 is going to be shit because of one...
body: that was a shitty joke and a shitty apology but i dont think people should be deciding cp2077 is going to be shit because of one of their employees considering they have 800 employees and the person who wrote that tweet probably worked in the media department so doesnt actually have anything to do with the games development

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 Makes Joke, Internet Mob Loses It
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Makes Joke, Internet Mob Loses It
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 Makes Joke, Internet Mob Loses It

Twitter is thankfully not the final frontier. But it is a place where a joke can land you in some hot water. This is what happened to the Twitter account for the much-anticipated Cyberpunk 2077. Yesterday it sent this now deleted reply out to a fan:

As we see, user @Rysteez asks to see “more guys,” and in turn, Cyberpunk 2077threw out a joke instead. As you’d expect, it didn’t take long before…

View On WordPress

title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Новые скриншоты и концепт-арты
body: Как известно, CD Projekt RED хоть и заявила о своем присутствии на Gamescom 2018, однако демонстрировать геймлей Cyberpunk 2077 широкой публике студия на мероприятии в Кёльне точно не станет. Впрочем, чтобы хоть как-то скрасить ожидания фанатов, разр… Читать дальше »
